title: Ep. 189 Rich Suttmeier Predicts: 2,000 Point Correction in Dow Imminent
itunes:title: Rich Suttmeier Predicts: 2,000 Point Correction in Dow Imminent
description: Rich Suttmeier, chief investment strategist at ValuEngine.com, says the Dow Jones index will fall at least another 2,000 points by year-end. Rich tells us which sectors to avoid – and gives us one conservative sector that investors should buy right now.
content:encoded: Rich Suttmeier, chief investment strategist at ValuEngine.com, says the Dow Jones index will fall at least another 2,000 points by year-end. Rich tells us which sectors to avoid – and gives us one conservative sector that investors should buy right now.
